mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IG_notice VALUES ( nb_num.nextval, #{nb_title}, #{nb_content},1, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_notice order by nb_regdate desc)) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_notice where nb_title like '%'||#{searchContent1}||'%' or nb_content like '%'||#{searchContent2}||'%' order by nb_regdate desc )) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_notice where nb_title like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by nb_regdate desc)) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_notice where nb_content like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by nb_regdate desc)) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
UPDATE IG_notice SET nb_readcount=nb_readcount+1 where nb_num=#{nb_num}
